entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 6:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: S 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets in the morning then to rain mixed with ice pellets near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain mixed with ice pellets changing to snow and ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023
